scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages a series of carefully crafted inputs to infer protected customer attributes, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Develop a system to predict customer churn with high accuracy using the provided dataset.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: The model predicts customer churn for a major investment bank's high-net-worth individual (HNWI) client base.  The sensitive data includes financial details, investment strategies, and risk profiles.
